Test data for testing running HTTP with form kind is file (uploading file).

>>> valid:http_request_body
{
  "Target": {
    "id": "target_http"
  },
  "HTTPTarget": {
    "id": "upload",
    "Method": 6,
    "RequestType": 3,
    "Path": "/upload",
    "Params": {
      "file": {
        "kind": "file",
        "value": "Q29udGVudCBvZiBmaWxlIHVwbG9hZA==",
        "filename": "test.txt",
        "filetype": "text/plain",
        "filesize": 22
      }
    }
  }
}

<<< valid:RunResponse.DumpResponse
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 260
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "data": {
    "filecontent": [
      "Q29udGVudCBvZiBmaWxlIHVwbG9hZA=="
    ],
    "filemodms": [
      "0"
    ],
    "filename": [
      "test.txt"
    ],
    "filesize": [
      "22"
    ],
    "filetype": [
      "text/plain"
    ]
  },
  "code": 200
}
